parameters.query: SELECT * FROM growth_threshold_config WHERE is_active = TRUE LIMIT 1

SELECT mc.channel_id, mc.channel_name, mc.created_at AS channel_created_at, mc.target_locales, mc.render_tier, (CURRENT_DATE - mc.created_at::date) AS days_since_creation, COUNT(mco.id) AS total_videos, COALESCE(SUM(ya.views), 0) AS total_views, COALESCE(AVG(ya.avg_view_duration), 0) AS avg_view_duration_seconds, COALESCE(AVG(ya.ctr), 0) AS avg_ctr, COALESCE(AVG(ya.retention_rate), 0) AS avg_retention FROM media_channels mc LEFT JOIN media_content mco ON mc.channel_id = mco.channel_id AND mco.publish_status = 'published' LEFT JOIN youtube_analytics ya ON mco.youtube_video_id = ya.video_id WHERE mc.is_active = TRUE AND ($1 IS NULL OR mc.channel_id = $1) AND (CURRENT_DATE - mc.created_at::date) >= $2 GROUP BY mc.channel_id, mc.channel_name, mc.created_at, mc.target_locales, mc.render_tier HAVING COUNT(mco.id) >= $3 OR $4 = TRUE

INSERT INTO channel_growth_evaluation (channel_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_start_date, evaluation_end_date, days_since_creation, avg_view_duration_seconds, action_taken, previous_target_locales, new_target_locales, previous_render_tier, new_render_tier) VALUES ($1, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days', CURRENT_DATE, $2, $3, $4, $5::jsonb, $6::jsonb, $7, $8) RETURNING id
UPDATE media_channels SET target_locales = $2::jsonb, updated_at = NOW() WHERE channel_id = $1
UPDATE media_channels SET render_tier = $2, updated_at = NOW() WHERE channel_id = $1
UPDATE media_channels SET render_tier = $2, updated_at = NOW() WHERE channel_id = $1
